oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nathan Straus Visit to Cheatham Place, 1939
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of U.S. Housing Authority Administrator Nathan Straus visiting Cheatham Place, December 1939. HIs visit to Nashville was part of a study of the interest in low-cost rural housing in Tennessee and other Southern states. Photographed by Wiles Photographers. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Straus, Nathan, 1889-1961
